P

paint(Graphics) - Method in class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.view.GameView
Paints the view and sets the GameView.setScoreMessage(String).
Calls GameView.drawBall(Ball, Graphics2D), GameView.drawPlayer(Player, Graphics2D), and GameView.drawMenu(Graphics2D), GameView.drawBrick(Brick, Graphics2D) depending on the state of the model GameBoard
paint(Graphics) - Method in class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.view.HomeMenu
Paints the view by calling HomeMenu.drawMenu(Graphics2D).

Player(Point, int, int, Rectangle) - Constructor for class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model.Player
Class constructor.
Initialises Player.moveAmount to zero.
Assigns Player.makeRectangle(int, int) to Player.playerFace.
Uses the fourth parameter to calculate the Player.min and Player.max
